summary: For Milou, 40, football is a real drug, a religion he practices as a fanatic. He makes a point of contributing by all means to the victory of his team: Standard de Liège. But his meeting with Martine will give him a good reason to drop out.
cast: Riton Liebman|Léa Drucker|David Murgia|Samir Guesmi|Guy Staumont|Michèle Moretti|Fabio Zenoni|Jackie Berroyer|Laurence Bibot|Héléna Noguerra|Michelangelo Marchese|Philippe Résimont|Nicolas Buysse|Ingrid Heiderscheidt|John Dobrynine|Isabelle de Hertogh|Denis Mpunga|Koen Jansen|Marc Zinga|Carmela Locantore|Anita Jans|Serge Larivière|Martial Wilgocki|Edmond Francey|Eléonore Tsibidas|Vincent Tavier|Bart Lemmens|Denyse Schwab|Georges Lini|Stéphane Fenocchi|Guillaume Malandrin|Bruno Bulté|Agathe Cornez|Muriel Bersy|Dominique Thirion|Lieve Meeussen|Philippe Eveno
title: Je suis supporter du Standard
